dc:title: Notes By The Way - May 1944
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Delights in the wedding of her daughter Tamar to David Hennessy at the Easton farm. Notes the sad loss of goats to wild dogs but reaffirms the worth of life on the land.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 400 1944-05-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
